00001 package liquibase.database.sql;

00011 public class CreateTableStatement implements SqlStatement {
00012     private String schemaName;
00013     private String tableName;
00014     private String tablespace;
00015     private List<String> columns = new ArrayList<String>();
00016     private Set<String> autoIncrementColumns = new HashSet<String>();
00017     private Map<String, String> columnTypes = new HashMap<String, String>();
00018     private Map<String, String> defaultValues = new HashMap<String, String>();
00019 
00020     private PrimaryKeyConstraint primaryKeyConstraint;
00021     private Set<String> notNullColumns = new HashSet<String>();
00022     private Set<ForeignKeyConstraint> foreignKeyConstraints = new HashSet<ForeignKeyConstraint>();
00023     private Set<UniqueConstraint> uniqueConstraints = new HashSet<UniqueConstraint>();

00028         this.tableName = tableName;

00070     public CreateTableStatement addPrimaryKeyColumn(String columnName, String columnType, ColumnConstraint... constraints) {
00071 //        String pkName = "PK_" + getTableName().toUpperCase();
00075         PrimaryKeyConstraint pkConstraint = new PrimaryKeyConstraint(null);
00076         pkConstraint.addColumns(columnName);
00077 
00078         List<ColumnConstraint> allConstraints = new ArrayList<ColumnConstraint>();
00079         allConstraints.addAll(Arrays.asList(constraints));
00080         allConstraints.add(new NotNullConstraint(columnName));
00081         allConstraints.add(pkConstraint);
00082 
00083 
00084         addColumn(columnName, columnType, allConstraints.toArray(new ColumnConstraint[allConstraints.size()]));
00085 
00086         return this;
00087     }

00089     public CreateTableStatement addColumn(String columnName, String columnType) {
00090         return addColumn(columnName, columnType, null, new ColumnConstraint[0]);
00091     }

00094         return addColumn(columnName, columnType, defaultValue, new ColumnConstraint[0]);
00095     }

00097     public CreateTableStatement addColumn(String columnName, String columnType, ColumnConstraint... constraints) {
00098         return addColumn(columnName, columnType, null, constraints);
00099     }
00100 
00101     public boolean supportsDatabase(Database database) {
00102         return true;
00103     }

00105     public CreateTableStatement addColumn(String columnName, String columnType, String defaultValue, ColumnConstraint... constraints) {
00106         this.getColumns().add(columnName);
00107         this.columnTypes.put(columnName, columnType);
00108         if (defaultValue != null) {
00109             defaultValues.put(columnName, defaultValue);
00110         }
00111         if (constraints != null) {
00112             for (ColumnConstraint constraint : constraints) {
00113                 if (constraint instanceof PrimaryKeyConstraint) {
00114                     if (this.getPrimaryKeyConstraint() == null) {
00115                         this.primaryKeyConstraint = (PrimaryKeyConstraint) constraint;
00116                     } else {
00117                         for (String column : ((PrimaryKeyConstraint) constraint).getColumns()) {
00118                             this.getPrimaryKeyConstraint().addColumns(column);
00119                         }
00120                     }
00121                 } else if (constraint instanceof NotNullConstraint) {
00122                     ((NotNullConstraint) constraint).setColumnName(columnName);
00123                     getNotNullColumns().add(columnName);
00124                 } else if (constraint instanceof ForeignKeyConstraint) {
00125                     ((ForeignKeyConstraint) constraint).setColumn(columnName);
00126                     getForeignKeyConstraints().add(((ForeignKeyConstraint) constraint));
00127                 } else if (constraint instanceof UniqueConstraint) {
00128                     ((UniqueConstraint) constraint).addColumns(columnName);
00129                     getUniqueConstraints().add(((UniqueConstraint) constraint));
00130                 } else if (constraint instanceof AutoIncrementConstraint) {
00131                     autoIncrementColumns.add(columnName);
00132                 } else {
00133                     throw new RuntimeException("Unknown constraint type: " + constraint.getClass().getName());
00134                 }
00135             }
00136         }
00137 
00138         return this;
00139     }
00140 
00141 
00142     public String getSqlStatement(Database database) {
00143 //        StringBuffer fkConstraints = new StringBuffer();
00144 
00145         StringBuffer buffer = new StringBuffer();
00146         buffer.append("CREATE TABLE ").append(database.escapeTableName(getSchemaName(), getTableName())).append(" ");
00147         buffer.append("(");
00148         Iterator<String> columnIterator = getColumns().iterator();
00149         while (columnIterator.hasNext()) {
00150             String column = columnIterator.next();
00151             boolean isAutoIncrement = autoIncrementColumns.contains(column);
00152 
00153             buffer.append(column);
00154             buffer.append(" ").append(database.getColumnType(columnTypes.get(column), isAutoIncrement));
00155 
00156             if (getDefaultValue(column) != null) {
00157                 if (database instanceof MSSQLDatabase) {
00158                     buffer.append(" CONSTRAINT ").append(((MSSQLDatabase) database).generateDefaultConstraintName(tableName, column));
00159                 }
00160                 buffer.append(" DEFAULT ");
00161                 buffer.append(getDefaultValue(column));
00162             }
00163 
00164             if (isAutoIncrement) {
00165                 buffer.append(" ").append(database.getAutoIncrementClause()).append(" ");
00166             }
00167 
00168             if (getNotNullColumns().contains(column)) {
00169                 buffer.append(" NOT NULL");
00170             } else {
00171                 if (database instanceof SybaseDatabase) {
00172                     buffer.append(" NULL");
00173                 }
00174             }
00175 
00176             if (columnIterator.hasNext()) {
00177                 buffer.append(", ");
00178             }
00179         }
00180 
00181         buffer.append(",");
00182 
00183         if (getPrimaryKeyConstraint() != null && getPrimaryKeyConstraint().getColumns().size() > 0) {
00184             String pkName = StringUtils.trimToNull(getPrimaryKeyConstraint().getConstraintName());
00185             if (pkName == null) {
00186                 pkName = database.generatePrimaryKeyName(getTableName());
00187             }
00188             buffer.append(" CONSTRAINT ");
00189             buffer.append(pkName);
00190             buffer.append(" PRIMARY KEY (");
00191             buffer.append(StringUtils.join(getPrimaryKeyConstraint().getColumns(), ", "));
00192             buffer.append(")");
00193             buffer.append(",");
00194         }
00195 
00196         for (ForeignKeyConstraint fkConstraint : getForeignKeyConstraints()) {
00197             buffer.append(" CONSTRAINT ")
00198                     .append(fkConstraint.getForeignKeyName())
00199                     .append(" FOREIGN KEY (")
00200                     .append(fkConstraint.getColumn())
00201                     .append(") REFERENCES ")
00202                     .append(fkConstraint.getReferences());
00203 
00204             if (fkConstraint.isDeleteCascade()) {
00205                 buffer.append(" ON DELETE CASCADE");
00206             }
00207 
00208 
00209             if (fkConstraint.isInitiallyDeferred()) {
00210                 buffer.append(" INITIALLY DEFERRED");
00211             }
00212             if (fkConstraint.isDeferrable()) {
00213                 buffer.append(" DEFERRABLE");
00214             }
00215             buffer.append(",");
00216         }
00217 
00218         for (UniqueConstraint uniqueConstraint : getUniqueConstraints()) {
00219             if (uniqueConstraint.getConstraintName() != null) {
00220                 buffer.append(" CONSTRAINT ");
00221                 buffer.append(uniqueConstraint.getConstraintName());
00222             }
00223             buffer.append(" UNIQUE (");
00224             buffer.append(StringUtils.join(uniqueConstraint.getColumns(), ", "));
00225             buffer.append("),");
00226         }
00227 
00228 //        if (constraints != null && constraints.getCheck() != null) {
00229 //            buffer.append(constraints.getCheck()).append(" ");
00230 //        }
00231 //    }
00232 
00233         String sql = buffer.toString().replaceFirst(",\\s*$", "") + ")";
00234 
00235 //        if (StringUtils.trimToNull(tablespace) != null && database.supportsTablespaces()) {
00236 //            if (database instanceof MSSQLDatabase) {
00237 //                buffer.append(" ON ").append(tablespace);
00238 //            } else if (database instanceof DB2Database) {
00239 //                buffer.append(" IN ").append(tablespace);
00240 //            } else {
00241 //                buffer.append(" TABLESPACE ").append(tablespace);
00242 //            }
00243 //        }
00244 
00245         if (getTablespace() != null && database.supportsTablespaces()) {
00246             if (database instanceof MSSQLDatabase) {
00247                 sql += " ON " + getTablespace();
00248             } else if (database instanceof DB2Database) {
00249                 sql += " IN " + getTablespace();
00250             } else {
00251                 sql += " TABLESPACE " + getTablespace();
00252             }
00253         }
00254         return sql;
00255     }
00256 
00257     public String getDefaultValue(String column) {
00258         return defaultValues.get(column);
00259     }
00260 
00261     public String getEndDelimiter(Database database) {
00262         return ";";
00263     }

00265     public CreateTableStatement addColumnConstraint(NotNullConstraint notNullConstraint) {
00266         getNotNullColumns().add(notNullConstraint.getColumnName());
00267         return this;
00268     }
00269 
00270     public CreateTableStatement addColumnConstraint(ForeignKeyConstraint fkConstraint) {
00271         getForeignKeyConstraints().add(fkConstraint);
00272         return this;
00273     }
00274 
00275     public CreateTableStatement addColumnConstraint(UniqueConstraint uniqueConstraint) {
00276         getUniqueConstraints().add(uniqueConstraint);
00277         return this;
00278     }

00280     public CreateTableStatement addColumnConstraint(AutoIncrementConstraint autoIncrementConstraint) {
00281         autoIncrementColumns.add(autoIncrementConstraint.getColumnName());
00282         return this;
